price: ߊ߰ ߏ߬ ߢߊ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߲ ߞߵߊ߬ ߓߘߊߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߟߊߝߏ߬ ߞߟߊ߬ߡߦߊ߬ߓߟߏߡߊ߬ ߟߋ߬
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
